survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Integration with IoT Devices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and challenges regarding the integration of smart home devices with IoT (Internet of Things) ecosystems, focusing on usability, security concerns, and future adoption intentions.
